Additions.title: Customizable Server Button
Additions.description: Quickly join any and all servers with this button! Customizable via holding shift and clicking it.

Additions.title: FOV Modifier
Additions.description: Modify the field of view whenever sprinting, aiming with a bow, have slowness, or have speed!

Additions.title: Support for Optifine 1.8.9 L5
Additions.description: Stay up to date with the latest Optifine version!

Additions.title: ToggleChat Improvements
Additions.description: Remove /boop messages from players using ToggleChat!

Fixes.title: Nick Hider Improvements
Fixes.description: Patched a possible crash when using Nick Hider.

Fixes.title: Limbo Detection
Fixes.description: Removed the user from the limbo state if they left the server.

Fixes.title: Performance
description: Patched up unclosed streams and connections.
Patched up memory leaks from server icons and tree generation.

Miscellaneous.title: Other Changes
description: Client brand is now set to 'hyperium'.
Head Scale max was changed from 2.5 to 3.
Hyperium now logs how long it took to start.
'FPS Limiter Amount' was renamed to 'FPS Limit'.
'Toggle Leather' keybind was changed to NONE by default.

Miscellaneous.title: Languages
Miscellaneous.description: German and Irish have been updated.
